isv.sap.payment.addon.facade

Interface CreditCardPaymentFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreditCardPaymentFacadeImpl

    public interface CreditCardPaymentFacade
    A customization of existing PaymentFacade which defines methods related to Credit Card payments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean authorizeFlexCreditCardPayment(CartModel cart, java.lang.String flexToken)
      Authorizes credit card payment using Flex Microforms token for a given cart
      boolean authorizeFlexCreditCardPayment(CartModel cart, java.lang.String flexToken, IsvPaymentTransactionEntryModel enrollmentTransaction)
      Authorizes credit card payment using Flex Microforms token for a given cart.
      boolean authorizeFlexCreditCardPayment(CartModel cart, java.lang.String flexToken, java.lang.String authJwt)
      Authorizes credit card payment, invoking authentication service, using Flex Microforms token for a given cart
      PaymentData beginCreatePayment(java.lang.String responseUrl)
      Creates an instance of PaymentData which encapsulates create subscription request based on selected strategy.
      PaymentSubscriptionResultData completeCreatePayment(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params, boolean saveInAccount)
      Completes creation of payment request.
      java.lang.String createEnrollmentJwt()
      Creates a new JWT (tokens must be regenerated even if the last one has not expired)
      IsvPaymentTransactionEntryModel enrollCreditCard(java.lang.String referenceId, java.lang.String transientToken)
      Does the check enrollment request for the given payment information

    • Method Detail

      • beginCreatePayment

        PaymentData beginCreatePayment(java.lang.String responseUrl)
        Creates an instance of PaymentData which encapsulates create subscription request based on selected strategy.
        Parameters:
        responseUrl - payment data response url
        Returns:
        payment data object created through subscription strategy

      • completeCreatePayment

        PaymentSubscriptionResultData completeCreatePayment(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                                                    boolean saveInAccount)
        Completes creation of payment request.
        Parameters:
        params - payment request parameters
        saveInAccount - boolean flag that specifies whether or not payment info should be saved into account
        Returns:
        resulting payment subscription data

      • authorizeFlexCreditCardPayment

        boolean authorizeFlexCreditCardPayment(CartModel cart,
                                       java.lang.String flexToken)
        Authorizes credit card payment using Flex Microforms token for a given cart
        Parameters:
        cart - cart
        flexToken - Flex Microforms token
        Returns:
        true if authorization succeeded, false otherwise

      • authorizeFlexCreditCardPayment

        boolean authorizeFlexCreditCardPayment(CartModel cart,
                                       java.lang.String flexToken,
                                       java.lang.String authJwt)
        Authorizes credit card payment, invoking authentication service, using Flex Microforms token for a given cart
        Parameters:
        cart - cart
        flexToken - Flex Microforms token
        Returns:
        true if authorization succeeded, false otherwise

      • authorizeFlexCreditCardPayment

        boolean authorizeFlexCreditCardPayment(CartModel cart,
                                       java.lang.String flexToken,
                                       IsvPaymentTransactionEntryModel enrollmentTransaction)
        Authorizes credit card payment using Flex Microforms token for a given cart. This is a follow on authorization after check enrollment allows to authorize without further validation
        Parameters:
        cart - cart
        flexToken - Flex Microforms token
        enrollmentTransaction - Initial enrollment check transaction. This transaction should have reason code 100 indicating that authorization does not require validation
        Returns:
        true if authorization succeeded, false otherwise

      • createEnrollmentJwt

        java.lang.String createEnrollmentJwt()
        Creates a new JWT (tokens must be regenerated even if the last one has not expired)
        Returns:
        new JWT

      • enrollCreditCard

        IsvPaymentTransactionEntryModel enrollCreditCard(java.lang.String referenceId,
                                                 java.lang.String transientToken)
        Does the check enrollment request for the given payment information
        Parameters:
        referenceId - Session ID provided on Cardinal 'payments.setupComplete' event
        transientToken - Flex microform token
        Returns:
